name: Vicious Ancient Battle
title: Vicious Ancient Battle
desc: The god whom the people of Watatsumi Island once trusted fought a bitter battle against the ruler of Narukami...\nMusoujin Gorge, that yawning chasm in Yashiori Island, is the lasting scar of that conflict...

skills.desc:
The opposing active character loses 1 Energy.
(Only one "Arcane Legend" card can be played per match. This card will be in your starting hand.)
